post.description: This API allows users to log in using their email and password. Here For device_type 1 for ios 2 for andriod

device_type.description: Device type: 1 for Android, 2 for iOS

message.example: Your Account is not active. Please Contact admin
Your phone and email is not verified

post.description: Registers a new user and sends OTP for email and phone verification.

terms_conditions.description: User's agreement to terms and conditions

post.description: Verifies the user's email by matching the OTP.
Resends the email OTP to the user's registered email address.
Resends an OTP to the user's email for forgot password.

otp.description: OTP received by the user (4 digits)

user_id: The user ID field is required.

new_password.description: New password (at least 8 characters with at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character)

confirm_password.description: Confirmation of the new password (must match the new password)

message.example: User Not Found with this id

get.summary: Get all blogs with optional search
get.description: Fetches a list of blogs with optional search filter, including related blog files.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query to filter blogs by title

post.description: Create a new folder for the user. Optionally, a folder can be nested under a parent folder by specifying the parent folder ID.

folder_id.description: ID of the parent Folder if any (optional)

post.description: Edit the details of an existing folder. You can change the name of the folder.

name.description: The new name for the folder.

folder_id.description: The ID of the folder to edit.

400.description: Bad Request: Validation errors or permission issue.

message.example: You don't have permission to edit this folder.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all folders for the authenticated user, including the total files count in each folder.

400.description: Bad Request: No folders found or other issue with data.

post.description: Uploads documents to a specific folder for the user

200.description: File added to the folder successfully

get.description: This endpoint allows users to delete a folder based on the folder ID.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the folder to be removed.

get.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve a folder by its ID along with its files.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the folder to retrieve.

get.description: This endpoint allows users to delete a file by its ID.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: ID of the file to delete.

tags: Issues List To Report In Post
get.description: Retrieve a predefined list of report issues.

post.description: Create a new post with optional files and associate it with a community based on pin code and city.

pin_code.description: The pin code for the community

issues.description: Optional issue related to the post

post_files.description: Array of files (images or videos). Maximum 10 files allowed.

get.summary: Get a list of communities grouped by pin code
get.description: Fetches communities grouped by pin code with city information, number of posts, visits, and total cities per pin code.

200.description: Community List Grouped By Pin Code

message.example: Community List Grouped By Pin Code

get.summary: Fetch cities based on pin code
get.description: This endpoint retrieves the list of cities associated with a given pin code.

404.description: No cities found for the provided pin code

get.summary: Get Community Posts by Pin Code
get.description: Fetch posts for the community filtered by pin code and excluding posts reported by the user.

parameters.name: pin_code
parameters.description: The pin code to filter the posts by.

message.example: Community List Grouped By Pin Code

issues.example: Some issues related to the post.

400.description: Bad Request: Missing or invalid pin code.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific post by its ID, if the post is not reported by the user.

message.example: Post has been reported by you.

get.description: This endpoint allows a user to like or unlike a post. If the post is already liked, it will be unliked.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: ID of the post to like/unlike

get.summary: Get all comments for a specific post
get.description: This endpoint retrieves all comments and their replies for a given post, including like and reply counts.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: ID of the post to fetch comments for

200.description: List of comments and their replies

post.summary: Add a comment to a post
post.description: This endpoint allows a user to add a comment to a post. Optionally, a reply to an existing comment can be provided.

post_id.description: ID of the post to report.

comment_id.description: ID of the parent comment if replying to a comment (optional)

get.description: Allows a user to like or unlike a comment.

schema.description: The ID of the comment to like or unlike.

get.description: Retrieves a list of reasons with their id, name, and description.

post.description: Allows users to report a post by providing a post ID and a reason ID.

post_id.description: ID of the post to report.

reason_id.description: ID of the reason for reporting the post.

422.description: Validation error: Invalid post_id or reason_id.

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to update their profile details such as name, email, phone number, and profile image.

400.description: Validation Error or Email Already Taken

confirm_password.description: Confirm password, must match new password

new_password: The new password field is required.

get.description: Deletes the authenticated user's account along with associated user addresses.
Retrieve a list of frequently asked questions.

post.description: Submit a form with the user's name, email, and description.

message.example: Your message has been sent successfully.
